description: The notification will be generated whenever a trap is received from devices managed by NNC or a trap is generated by NNC server its self.

Summary.eval: ($v4 == 1) ? 'NNC server notification cleared' : 'NNC server notification occurred due to $v7'

description: Represents the perceived severity values for the alarms as per[X.733]

description: Represents the event type values for the alarms as per [X.733] and [X.736]

description: Identifies that it is a threshold crossing event.

description: Identifies refinement to probable cause of the alarm.
